components.name: SnmpTraps Source
components.description: A Flume source that listens to snmp traps.

snmpVersion.name: Snmp version
snmpVersion.description: SNMP Protocol version. Possible values: V1,V2c,V3.

snmpTrapVersion.name: SnmpTrap version
snmpTrapVersion.description: SNMP Trap Protocol version. Possible values: V1,V2c,V3.

authenticationType.name: Authentication type
authenticationType.description: SNMP Authentication. Possible values: AUTH_NOPRIV, NOAUTH_NOPRIV, AUTH_PRIV.

username.name: User name
username.description: Username. Required when authenticationType -> AUTH_NOPRIV, AUTH_PRIV

password.name: Password
password.description: Password. Required when authenticationType -> AUTH_NOPRIV, AUTH_PRIV

privacyProtocol.name: Body
privacyProtocol.description: Privacy protocol. Required when authenticationType -> AUTH_PRIV. Possible values: PrivDES, Priv3DES, PrivAES128, PrivAES192, PrivAES256, PrivAES192With3DESKeyExtension, PrivAES256With3DESKeyExtension.

privacyPassphrase.name: Privacy passphrase
privacyPassphrase.description: Privacy passphrase. Required when authenticationType -> AUTH_PRIV.
